column2:
EMF works toward an increasingly flavorful, less repetitive, more strategic, more challenging, more balanced, more customizable, and most important of all, more coherent CKII, featuring much greater dynamism and unpredictability.

Please report bugs, give feedback, or generally participate in the discussion of how to further improve the game in our HIP forum thread at ParadoxPlaza.

EMF team:
AnaxXiphos (Developer, Art Guru)
Think0028 (Developer)
